snippet: The Belgian qualifier David Goffin extended his winning streak to 23 matches when he beat the defending champion Jürgen Melzer of Austria, 6-3, 6-4, in the first round of the Winston-Salem Open.
lead_paragraph: The Belgian qualifier David Goffin extended his winning streak to 23 matches when he beat the defending champion Jürgen Melzer of Austria, 6-3, 6-4, in the first round of the Winston-Salem Open.
